intro: Welcome to "TERAVIT", a sandbox game created by players! With its three elements of "Create, Play, and Share", you can enjoy adventure and endless creation!
description:
TERAVIT is a sandbox game that allows players to create their own worlds and share them with other players, creating infinite play possibilites.
In TERAVIT, there is a wide variety of player-created game worlds packed with adventures, RPGs, racing games for speed competition, obstacle courses, PvP for action-packed enjoyment, monster hunting, and more. There's so much to play and enjoy that you'll never run out of fun.

◆Create
Create your own world by combining hundreds of blocks, gimmicks, and assets!
There are many useful tools for ease of creation, such as destroying many blocks at once, duplicating buildings, and more!
By using the "Event Editor," you can create event scenes to your liking, including NPC quest dialogues, initiating event battles, and controlling the camera work.
You can also create various game clear rules for the world you've created.
Create worlds where you can enjoy various games like RPGs, racing, and action, and have fun together with everyone!

◆Play
TERAVIT is a game where you can enjoy worlds with various themes such as RPG, racing, battles, and adventures.
New worlds are added daily by players, so you'll always have new games to play.
Players can freely play in the world with an avatar, combining various avatar parts to look how they like and enjoy different themed worlds with a variety of actions; such as sword and bow attacks, 'paragliding' to glide through the sky, and 'hookshot' to make large movements to targeted locations.

◆Share
Upload your created world for other players to enjoy!


◆Multiplayer
Enjoy Teravitt with up to 64 players online.
Parkour competitions, cooperative adventures, building one big castle together, etc. are unique ways for many players to enjoy Teravit together.
